Title: Fire and Ice Pickles
Ingredient: 6 oz. Cucumber // 2 tbsp. White Onion, Chopped // 1/4 cup Erythritol // 1/2 cup White Vinegar // 1/2 cup Water // 1/2 tsp. Red Pepper Flakes // 1/2 tsp. Cayenne Pepper // 1/4 tsp. Celery Seeds // 15 drops Stevia // Salt and Pepper to Taste

Title: 5 Minute Keto Pesto
Ingredient: 1 1/2 cups Basil // 1/3 cup Pine Nuts (toasted) // 3/4 cup Parmesan // 2/3 cup Olive Oil // 1 tsp. Minced Garlic // 2 tsp. Tomato Paste // Salt and Pepper to taste

Title: 5 Minute Keto Raspberry Vinaigrette
Ingredient: 1/2 cup Golden Raspberries // 1/2 cup White Wine Vinegar // 1/2 cup Extra Virgin Olive Oil // 35 drops Liquid Stevia

Title: Low Carb Blackberry Chipotle Jam
Ingredient: 8 oz. Blackberries // 1 1/2 Chipotle in Adobo (1 1/2 whole chipotle peppers) // 1/4 cup Erythritol // 8 drops Liquid Stevia // 1/4 cup MCT Oil // 1/4 tsp. Guar Gum

Title: Keto 5 Minute Caesar Dressing
Ingredient: 3 cloves Garlic, finely minced // 1.5 tsp. Anchovy Paste // 2 tbsp. Fresh Lemon Juice (~1/2 lemon) // 1.5 tsp. Dijon Mustard // 1 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce // 3/4 cup Mayonnaise // Salt and Pepper to Taste (~1/4 tsp. each)

Title: Homemade Sambal
Ingredient: 1 large Onion, blended // 0.35 oz. Dried Chilis // 3 tbsp. Reduced Sugar Ketchup // 1/2 tsp. Salt (or to taste) // 2 tbsp. Coconut Oil // 1-2 drops Liquid Sucralose (Optional)

Title: Homemade Pumpkin Pie Spice
Ingredient: 2 tbsp. Ground Cinnamon // 1 tbsp. Ground Ginger // 1/2 tsp. Ground Nutmeg // 1/2 tsp. Allspice // 1/2 tsp. Ground Cloves // 1/4 tsp. Cardamom

Title: Roasted Garlic Chipotle Aioli
Ingredient: 1 tbsp. Roasted Garlic // 1/2 cup Olive Oil // 1/4 cup Sour Cream // 2 large Egg Yolks // 2 tsp. Lemon Juice // 1 tsp. Dijon Mustard // 1/4 tsp. Chipotle Powder // Salt and Pepper to Taste

Title: Bacon and Roasted Garlic Spinach Dip
Ingredient: 6 slices Bacon // 8 oz. Cream Cheese, softened // 1/2 cup Sour Cream // 5 oz. Fresh Spinach, wilted in bacon grease // 2.5 oz. Parmesan Cheese, grated // 1 1/2 tbsp. Fresh Parsley, chopped // 1 tbsp. Roasted Garlic (recipe here) // 1 tbsp. Lemon Juice // Salt and Pepper to Taste

Title: Bacon and Roasted Garlic Guacamole
Ingredient: 2 medium Hass Avocados // 4 slices Bacon // 1/3 medium Red Bell Pepper // 1/4 small Onion // 1 tbsp. Roasted Garlic (recipe here) // 1/3 cup Cilantro, chopped // Juice 1/2 Lime // Salt and Pepper to Taste

Title: Oven Roasted Garlic
Ingredient: 12 heads Garlic // 1/2 cup Olive Oil

Title: Strawberry Chia Seed Jam
Ingredient: 8 oz. Fresh Strawberries // 1/4 cup Erythritol, powdered // 2 tbsp. Chia Seeds // 1/4 cup Water

Title: Simple, Delicious Guacamole
Ingredient: 2 Hass Avocados // 1/3 medium Red Onion // 1 medium Jalapeno // 1/2 bunch Fresh Cilantro // Juice of 1 Lime (1 tbsp.) // Kosher Salt // Freshly Ground Black Pepper // 2 tbsp. Pre-made Salsa

Title: Thick and Sticky Maple Syrup
Ingredient: 3/4 Cup Water // 1/4 Cup NOW Foods Erythritol (Powdered) // 1 Tbsp. Unsalted Butter // 2 1/4 tsp. Coconut Oil // 2 tsp. Maple Extract // 1/2 tsp. Vanilla Extract // 1/4 tsp. Xanthan Gum // Optional: 1/2 tsp. Cinnamon

Title: Keto Friendly Bacon Jam
Ingredient: 14 Slices Bacon // 1 Cup Black Coffee // 1 Medium Onion // 3 Tbsp. Apple Cider Vinegar // 1.5 Oz. Scotch (1 Shot) // 2 Tbsp. NOW Erythritol // 1 Tbsp. + 1 tsp. Minced Garlic // 1 Tbsp. Hot Sauce // 1 Tbsp. Soy Sauce // 2 tsp. Liquid Smoke // 1 tsp. Worcestershire // 1 tsp. Black Pepper // 7 Drops Liquid Stevia

Title: Homemade Tomato Sauce
Ingredient: 1 1/2 Cups Jarred Tomato Sauce // 1/4 Cup Red Wine // 1 Green Bell Pepper // 1 Tbsp. Fresh Chopped Thyme // 1 Tbsp. Grass Fed Butter

Title: Tangy Low Carb Tartar Sauce
Ingredient: 1/2 cup mayo // 1 Tbsp diced dill pickle // 1 tsp lemon juice, or to taste // 1 tsp finely diced onion (I used 1 green onion) // 1/2 tsp dill weed

Title: Zesty Keto Italian Dressing
Ingredient: 1/4 cup Oregano // 1/4 cup Celtic Sea Salt // 2 Tbs Parsley // 2 Tbs Garlic Granules (or salt) // 2 Tbs Onion Granules (or salt) // 2 tsp Basil // 2 tsp Pepper

Title: Easy Keto Honey Vinaigrette
Ingredient: 1 cup Braggs Olive Oil // 1/2 cup Braggs Apple Cider Vinegar // 1 Tbsp Raw Honey // Stevia to taste (1/16 – 1/8 tsp)

Title: Catalina Style Dressing
Ingredient: 1/2 cup Olive oil (I use Braggs) // 1/4 cup Ketchup // 1/4 cup Braggs Apple Cider Vinegar // 1/4 cup Onion, diced small // 1/2 tsp Worcestershire Sauce // 1/2 tsp Smoked Paprika // 1/8 tsp Powdered Stevia or to taste // Salt and Pepper to taste (about 1/8 tsp each)

Title: Cocktail Sauce Keto-Style
Ingredient: 1 cup ketchup // 1/3 cup prepared horseradish (or cream style, watch nutrition info though) // 1/2 Tbsp. worcestershire sauce // 2 Tbsp. lemon juice // 1/4 tsp. Frank’s hot sauce

Title: LC Thousand Island Dressing
Ingredient: 1 cup mayo (try this homemade mayo) // 2 Tbsp ketchup (try this homemade ketchup) // 1 Tbsp Braggs apple cider vinegar // 2 Tbsp finely diced pickle // 2 Tbsp finely diced onion // 1/8 tsp powdered stevia or to taste // 1/8 tsp salt // 1/8 tsp pepper

Title: Keto-Approved Ranch Dressing
Ingredient: 1 cup mayo // 1/2 cup sour cream (can use plain Greek yogurt // 1/4 cup heavy cream // 2 Tbsp dried parsley // 1/2 tsp dried dill // 1/2 tsp garlic granules // 1/2 tsp onion powder // 1/4 tsp basil // 1/4 tsp pepper

Title: Handcrafted Mayonnaise
Ingredient: 3/4 cup olive oil (I use Braggs) // 1/2 cup coconut oil, melted, but not hot // 1 large egg, room temp // 2 large egg yolks, room temp // 1 tsp Dijon mustard // 1 Tbs whey (optional) // pinch salt // pinch smoked paprika // stevia to taste (3 drops liquid)

Title: Homemade LC Ketchup
Ingredient: 3 7oz jars tomato paste (or 2 1/2 cups + 2 Tbsp) // 1/3 cup fish sauce (or 1/3 cup soy sauce or 1 1/2 Tbsp salt) // 1/4 cup whey (optional, see note below) // 1 tsp molasses (optional) // 1 tsp garlic powder // 1/2 tsp allspice // 1/4 tsp cinnamon // 1/8 tsp paprika (or cayenne) // 1/8 tsp ground cloves (optional) // sweetener to taste (I used less than 1/8 tsp powdered stevia)

Title: Spicy and Tangy BBQ Sauce
Ingredient: 1/2 Cup Reduced Sugar Ketchup // 1 Tbsp. Louisiana Hot Sauce // 1-2 tsp. Yellow Mustard // 1 tsp. Liquid Smoke // 1 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce // 1/2 tsp. Garlic Powder // 1/2 tsp. Onion Powder // 1/2 tsp. Chili Powder // 1/2 tsp. Cayenne Pepper // 1/2 tsp. Cumin
